member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Cookies.CookieAuthenticationEvents

member.summary: Invoked to validate the principal.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Cookies.CookieAuthenticationEvents.OnCheckSlidingExpiration
member.summary: Invoked to check if the cookie should be renewed.

member.summary: Invoked on signing in.

member.summary: Invoked on signing out.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Cookies.CookieAuthenticationEvents.OnRedirectToLogin
member.summary: Invoked when the client needs to be redirected to the sign in url.

member.summary: Invoked when the client needs to be redirected to the access denied url.

member.summary: Invoked when the client is to be redirected to logout.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Cookies.CookieAuthenticationEvents.OnRedirectToReturnUrl

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Cookies.CookieAuthenticationHandler
member.summary: Implementation for the cookie-based authentication handler.
Initializes a new instance of .

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Cookies.CookieAuthenticationHandler.Events
member.summary: The handler calls methods on the events which give the application control at certain points where processing is occurring. If it is not provided a default instance is supplied which does nothing when the methods are called.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Cookies.CookieAuthenticationHandler.CreateEventsAsync
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the events instance.
member.returns: A new instance of the events instance.

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Cookies.CookieAuthenticationOptions
member.summary: Configuration options for .

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Cookies.CookieAuthenticationOptions.#ctor
member.summary: Create an instance of the options initialized with the default values

summary.para: Determines the settings used to create the cookie.
defaults to . defaults to true. defaults to .

remarks.para: The default value for cookie is ".AspNetCore.Cookies". This value should be changed if you change the name of the AuthenticationScheme, especially if your system uses the cookie authentication handler multiple times.

determines if the browser should allow the cookie to be attached to same-site or cross-site requests. The default is Lax, which means the cookie is only allowed to be attached to cross-site requests using safe HTTP methods and same-site requests.

determines if the browser should allow the cookie to be accessed by client-side javascript. The default is true, which means the cookie will only be passed to http requests and is not made available to script on the page.
is currently ignored. Use to control lifetime of cookie authentication.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Cookies.CookieAuthenticationOptions.DataProtectionProvider
member.summary: If set this will be used by the CookieAuthenticationHandler for data protection.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Cookies.CookieAuthenticationOptions.SlidingExpiration
member.summary: The SlidingExpiration is set to true to instruct the handler to re-issue a new cookie with a new expiration time any time it processes a request which is more than halfway through the expiration window.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Cookies.CookieAuthenticationOptions.LoginPath
member.summary: The LoginPath property is used by the handler for the redirection target when handling ChallengeAsync. The current url which is added to the LoginPath as a query string parameter named by the ReturnUrlParameter. Once a request to the LoginPath grants a new SignIn identity, the ReturnUrlParameter value is used to redirect the browser back to the original url.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Cookies.CookieAuthenticationOptions.LogoutPath
member.summary: If the LogoutPath is provided the handler then a request to that path will redirect based on the ReturnUrlParameter.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Cookies.CookieAuthenticationOptions.AccessDeniedPath
member.summary: The AccessDeniedPath property is used by the handler for the redirection target when handling ForbidAsync.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Cookies.CookieAuthenticationOptions.ReturnUrlParameter
member.summary: The ReturnUrlParameter determines the name of the query string parameter which is appended by the handler during a Challenge. This is also the query string parameter looked for when a request arrives on the login path or logout path, in order to return to the original url after the action is performed.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Cookies.CookieAuthenticationOptions.Events
member.summary: The Provider may be assigned to an instance of an object created by the application at startup time. The handler calls methods on the provider which give the application control at certain points where processing is occurring. If it is not provided a default instance is supplied which does nothing when the methods are called.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Cookies.CookieAuthenticationOptions.TicketDataFormat
member.summary: The TicketDataFormat is used to protect and unprotect the identity and other properties which are stored in the cookie value. If not provided one will be created using .

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Cookies.CookieAuthenticationOptions.CookieManager
member.summary:
The component used to get cookies from the request or set them on the response.
ChunkingCookieManager will be used by default.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Cookies.CookieAuthenticationOptions.SessionStore
member.summary: An optional container in which to store the identity across requests. When used, only a session identifier is sent to the client. This can be used to mitigate potential problems with very large identities.

summary.para: Controls how much time the authentication ticket stored in the cookie will remain valid from the point it is created The expiration information is stored in the protected cookie ticket. Because of that an expired cookie will be ignored even if it is passed to the server after the browser should have purged it.
This is separate from the value of , which specifies how long the browser will keep the cookie.

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Cookies.CookieSignedInContext
member.summary: Context object passed to the ICookieAuthenticationEvents method SignedIn.
Creates a new instance of the context object.

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Cookies.CookieSigningInContext
member.summary: Context object passed to the .
Creates a new instance of the context object.
member.param: Initializes options for the authentication cookie.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Cookies.CookieSigningInContext.CookieOptions
member.summary: The options for creating the outgoing cookie. May be replace or altered during the SigningIn call.

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Cookies.CookieSigningOutContext
member.summary: Context object passed to the

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Cookies.CookieSigningOutContext.CookieOptions
member.summary: The options for creating the outgoing cookie. May be replace or altered during the SigningOut call.

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Cookies.CookieSlidingExpirationContext
member.summary: Context object passed to the CookieAuthenticationEvents OnCheckSlidingExpiration method.
Creates a new instance of the context object.
member.param: Contains the initial values for identity and extra data

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Cookies.CookieSlidingExpirationContext.ElapsedTime
member.summary: The amount of time that has elapsed since the cookie was issued or renewed.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Cookies.CookieSlidingExpirationContext.RemainingTime
member.summary: The amount of time left until the cookie expires.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Cookies.CookieSlidingExpirationContext.ShouldRenew
member.summary: If true, the cookie will be renewed. The initial value will be true if the elapsed time is greater than the remaining time (e.g. more than 50% expired).

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Cookies.CookieValidatePrincipalContext
member.summary: Context object passed to the CookieAuthenticationEvents ValidatePrincipal method.
Creates a new instance of the context object.
member.param: Contains the initial values for identity and extra data

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Cookies.CookieValidatePrincipalContext.ShouldRenew
member.summary: If true, the cookie will be renewed

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Cookies.CookieValidatePrincipalContext.ReplacePrincipal(System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal)
member.summary: Called to replace the claims principal. The supplied principal will replace the value of the Principal property, which determines the identity of the authenticated request.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Cookies.CookieValidatePrincipalContext.RejectPrincipal
member.summary: Called to reject the incoming principal. This may be done if the application has determined the account is no longer active, and the request should be treated as if it was anonymous.

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Cookies.ICookieManager
member.summary: This is used by the CookieAuthenticationMiddleware to process request and response cookies. It is abstracted from the normal cookie APIs to allow for complex operations like chunking.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Cookies.ICookieManager.GetRequestCookie(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.HttpContext,System.String)
member.summary: Retrieve a cookie of the given name from the request.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Cookies.ICookieManager.AppendResponseCookie(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.HttpContext,System.String,System.String,Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.CookieOptions)
member.summary: Append the given cookie to the response.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Cookies.ICookieManager.DeleteCookie(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.HttpContext,System.String,Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.CookieOptions)
member.summary: Append a delete cookie to the response.

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Cookies.ITicketStore
member.summary: This provides an abstract storage mechanic to preserve identity information on the server while only sending a simple identifier key to the client. This is most commonly used to mitigate issues with serializing large identities into cookies.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Cookies.ITicketStore.StoreAsync(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.AuthenticationTicket)
member.summary: Store the identity ticket and return the associated key.
member.returns: The key that can be used to retrieve the identity later.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Cookies.ITicketStore.StoreAsync(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.AuthenticationTicket,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Store the identity ticket and return the associated key.
member.param: The used to propagate notifications that the operation should be canceled.
member.returns: The key that can be used to retrieve the identity later.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Cookies.ITicketStore.RenewAsync(System.String,Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.AuthenticationTicket)
member.summary: Tells the store that the given identity should be updated.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Cookies.ITicketStore.RenewAsync(System.String,Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.AuthenticationTicket,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Tells the store that the given identity should be updated.
member.param: The used to propagate notifications that the operation should be canceled.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Cookies.ITicketStore.RetrieveAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves an identity from the store for the given key.
member.param: The key associated with the identity.
member.returns: The identity associated with the given key, or null if not found.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Cookies.ITicketStore.RetrieveAsync(System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Retrieves an identity from the store for the given key.
member.param: The key associated with the identity.
The used to propagate notifications that the operation should be canceled.
member.returns: The identity associated with the given key, or null if not found.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Cookies.ITicketStore.RemoveAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Remove the identity associated with the given key.
member.param: The key associated with the identity.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Cookies.ITicketStore.RemoveAsync(System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Remove the identity associated with the given key.
member.param: The key associated with the identity.
The used to propagate notifications that the operation should be canceled.

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Cookies.ChunkingCookieManager
member.summary: This handles cookies that are limited by per cookie length. It breaks down long cookies for responses, and reassembles them from requests.

member.name: F:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Cookies.ChunkingCookieManager.DefaultChunkSize
member.summary: The default maximum size of characters in a cookie to send back to the client.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Cookies.ChunkingCookieManager.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of .

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Cookies.ChunkingCookieManager.ChunkSize
member.summary:
The maximum size of cookie to send back to the client. If a cookie exceeds this size it will be broken down into multiple cookies. Set this value to null to disable this behavior. The default is 4090 characters, which is supported by all common browsers.
Note that browsers may also have limits on the total size of all cookies per domain, and on the number of cookies per domain.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Cookies.ChunkingCookieManager.ThrowForPartialCookies
member.summary: Throw if not all chunks of a cookie are available on a request for re-assembly.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Cookies.ChunkingCookieManager.GetRequestCookie(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.HttpContext,System.String)
member.summary: Get the reassembled cookie. Non chunked cookies are returned normally. Cookies with missing chunks just have their "chunks-XX" header returned.
member.returns: The reassembled cookie, if any, or null.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Cookies.ChunkingCookieManager.AppendResponseCookie(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.HttpContext,System.String,System.String,Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.CookieOptions)
member.summary: Appends a new response cookie to the Set-Cookie header. If the cookie is larger than the given size limit then it will be broken down into multiple cookies as follows: Set-Cookie: CookieName=chunks-3; path=/ Set-Cookie: CookieNameC1=Segment1; path=/ Set-Cookie: CookieNameC2=Segment2; path=/ Set-Cookie: CookieNameC3=Segment3; path=/

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Cookies.ChunkingCookieManager.DeleteCookie(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.HttpContext,System.String,Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.CookieOptions)
member.summary: Deletes the cookie with the given key by setting an expired state. If a matching chunked cookie exists on the request, delete each chunk.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.CookieExtensions
member.summary: Extension methods to configure cookie authentication.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.CookieExtensions.AddCookie(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.AuthenticationBuilder)
member.summary:
Adds cookie authentication to using the default scheme. The default scheme is specified by .
Cookie authentication uses a HTTP cookie persisted in the client to perform authentication.
member.returns: A reference to after the operation has completed.
